signature.name: getwithoptions
signature.synopsis: accepts a parameter, options and environment

signature.name: postwithoptions
signature.synopsis: accepts a parameter, options and environment

signature.name: mycommand
signature.synopsis: Generates a new Amazon EC2 image using the supplied scripts
signature.description: Using a baseAMI and a set of scripts, builds up (or finds existing) AMI image that matches the criteria.

options.description: specify the root folder where scripts can be found
the AMI name that will form the basis of the new images
The amazon region in which to create the image
if set, the resulting AMI will be a 32 bit image.  Ignored if a specific base AMI is specified (--ami).
if set, the resulting AMI will be a 64 bit image.  Ignored if a specific base AMI is specified (--ami).
if set, the resulting AMI(s) will be made public

returns.name: ami
returns.description: Amazon AMI Image Id, e.g. ami-bf62a9d6

returns.name: region
returns.description: Amazon AWS region in which the ami can be found

signature.name: anothercommand
signature.synopsis: Lists available scripts for use in gen
signature.description: Finds the available scripts, which are stored in subfolders of the root (see root option)

options.description: specify the root folder where scripts can be found

returns.name: scripts
returns.description: List of scripts relative to the root path
